remarks: Membership in an element of a mapping function-defined family of sets. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 19-Oct-2016.)
statement:
abfmpeld.1 $e |- F = ( x e. V |-> { y | ps } ) $.
abfmpeld.2 $e |- ( ph -> { y | ps } e. _V ) $.
abfmpeld.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( x = A /\ y = B ) -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) ) $.
abfmpeld $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A e. V /\ B e. W ) -> ( B e. ( F ` A ) <-> ch ) ) ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d F x y $.
$d V x y $.
$d W y $.
$d ch x y $.
$d ph x y $.
